message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair and generous offer!
A slightly more balanced offer, hope you like it!
A small concession, but I'm willing to give in a bit more. Your turn again!
I'm willing to compromise, but not that much. Your turn again!
I'm getting closer to my final offer. You're running out of options, Bob!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll make one more offer before I walk away.
